languages.text: "Приоресса Лугналия была обращена Гектархиусом на одном из языческих миров и много лет служила его телохранительницей, а впоследствии стала защитницей реликвария и лидером боевого крыла Ордена. Что касается брата Тикона, то он, аристократ по происхождению, получил блестящее образование и мог бы жить в роскоши, но отринул мирскую жизнь ради схимы. Он умен, чуток и эрудирован, а главное — искренне милосерден".

"Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education and could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."
languages.original_text: "Приоресса Лугналия была обращена Гектархиусом на одном из языческих миров и много лет служила его телохранительницей, а впоследствии стала защитницей реликвария и лидером боевого крыла Ордена. Что касается брата Тикона, то он, аристократ по происхождению, получил блестящее образование и мог бы жить в роскоши, но отринул мирскую жизнь ради схимы. Он умен, чуток и эрудирован, а главное — искренне милосерден".

traits.locale_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protectress of the reliquary and the leader of the order's military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education, and he could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

languages.text: «La prioresa Lugnalia fue convertida por Hectarchius en un mundo pagano. Fue su guardaespaldas durante muchos años y acabó convirtiéndose en protectora del relicario de la orden y en líder de su rama militar. En cuanto al hermano Tychon, es aristócrata de nacimiento y hubiera vivido rodeado de lujos si no hubiera renunciado a la vida laica para prestar juramento ascético. Es inteligente, pensativo, educado y, sobre todo, verdaderamente compasivo».
languages.original_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education and could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

traits.locale_text: «La prioresa Lugnalia fue convertida por Hectarchius en un mundo pagano. Fue su guardaespaldas durante muchos años y acabó convirtiéndose en protectora del relicario de la orden y en líder de su rama militar. En cuanto al hermano Tychon, es aristócrata de nacimiento y hubiera vivido rodeado de lujos si no hubiera renunciado a la vida laica para prestar juramento ascético. Es inteligente, pensativo, educado y, sobre todo, verdaderamente compasivo».

languages.text: « La prieure Lugnalia a été convertie par Hectarchius sur un monde païen. Elle lui a ensuite servi de garde personnelle pendant de longues années, avant de devenir la protectrice des reliques de l'ordre et de prendre le commandement de son bras miliaire. En ce qui concerne le frère Tychon, c'est un aristocrate de naissance qui a reçu une éducation de tout premier ordre. Il aurait pu choisir une vie de luxe, mais il a préféré renoncer aux jouissances matérielles et faire vœu d'ascétisme. Il est intelligent, attentionné, éduqué et, par-dessus tout, doté d'une bienveillance sincère. »
languages.original_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

Il est intelligent, attentionné, éduqué et, par-dessus tout, doté d'une bienveillance sincère. »

languages.text: “拉格娜里娅院长原本是异端世界的异教徒，后来听从赫克塔奇乌斯教长的指引，皈依了国教。此后多年，她一直担任教长的贴身保镖，最终成为修会圣骨匣的保护者与军事部门的领导人。至于第谷兄弟，他出身名门贵族，受过高等教育。他本可以过上舒适优渥的生活，但他却发下了苦行的誓言，放弃了世俗的享乐。他很聪明，很有思想，博览群书。最重要的是，他心地仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education and could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

traits.locale_text: “拉格娜里娅院长原本是异端世界的异教徒，后来听从赫克塔奇乌斯教长的指引，皈依了国教。此后多年，她一直担任教长的贴身保镖，最终成为修会圣骨匣的保护者与军事部门的领导人。至于第谷兄弟，他出身名门贵族，受过高等教育。他本可以过上舒适优渥的生活，但他却发下了苦行的誓言，放弃了世俗的享乐。他很聪明，很有思想，博览群书。最重要的是，他心地仁慈。”

languages.text: 「ルグナリア筆頭修道女は、異教徒の世界の出身であり、ヘクタールキウスによって改宗させられたのです。その後、彼女は長年にわたって彼の護衛を務め、やがて修道会の聖遺物の保護者となり、軍事部門のリーダーとなりました。ブラザー・ティコンについては、彼は生まれながらの貴族であり、優れた教育を受けてきました。禁欲的な誓願のために世俗的な生活を捨てることがなければ、贅沢な暮らしができたことでしょう。彼は聡明で思慮深く、読書家であり、そして最も重要なことは、純粋に慈悲深いということです」
languages.original_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education and could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."

traits.locale_text: 「ルグナリア筆頭修道女は、異教徒の世界の出身であり、ヘクタールキウスによって改宗させられたのです。その後、彼女は長年にわたって彼の護衛を務め、やがて修道会の聖遺物の保護者となり、軍事部門のリーダーとなりました。ブラザー・ティコンについては、彼は生まれながらの貴族であり、優れた教育を受けてきました。禁欲的な誓願のために世俗的な生活を捨てることがなければ、贅沢な暮らしができたことでしょう。彼は聡明で思慮深く、読書家であり、そして最も重要なことは、純粋に慈悲深いということです」

languages.text: "Priorin Lugnalia wurde auf einer der heidnischen Welten von Hectarchius konvertiert. Danach diente sie ihm viele Jahre als Leibwache und wurde schließlich zur Beschützern der Reliquien des Ordens und zur Führerin seines militärischen Zweigs. Was Bruder Tychon angeht: Er wurde in die Aristokratie geboren, hat eine hervorragende Ausbildung genossen und hätte im Luxus leben können, hätte er nicht dem weltlichen Leben abgeschworen und ein Gelübde der Askese abgelegt. Er ist intelligent, bedacht, belesen und vor allem aufrichtig gnadenvoll."

languages.text: "Başrahibe Lugnalia, dinsiz dünyalardan birinde Hectarchius tarafından dine çekildi. Ardından uzun yıllar boyunca Hectarchius'un koruması olarak hizmet verdi. En nihayetinde tarikatın kutsal emanet odasının koruyucusu ve askerî kolunun lideri hâline geldi. Rahip Tychon'dan bahsedecek olursak o doğuştan bir aristokrat. Muazzam bir eğitim almış. Çileci yeminler uğruna dünyevi yaşamı reddetmeseydi lüks içinde yaşayabilirdi. Zeki, düşünceli, kültürlü ve en önemlisi de canıgönülden merhametli birisi."
languages.original_text: "Prioress Lugnalia was converted by Hectarchius on one of the heathen worlds. She then served as his bodyguard for many years and eventually became the protector of the order's reliquary and the leader of its military branch. As for Brother Tychon, he is an aristocrat by birth, he had an excellent education and could have lived in luxury had he not renounced secular life for the sake of ascetic vows. He is intelligent, thoughtful, well read, and, most importantly, genuinely merciful."
